com.openkm.module

接口 PropertyModule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DbPropertyModule, JcrPropertyModule, OKMProperty, PropertyService

    public interface PropertyModule

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

    • 方法详细资料

      • addCategory

        void addCategory(java.lang.String token,
               java.lang.String nodePath,
               java.lang.String catId)
                 throws VersionException,
                        LockException,
                        PathNotFoundException,
                        AccessDeniedException,
                        RepositoryException,
                        DatabaseException
        Add a category to a node.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        catId - Category id (the UUID of the category node).
        抛出:
        VersionException - A document checked in can't be modified.
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no node in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the node because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • removeCategory

        void removeCategory(java.lang.String token,
                  java.lang.String nodePath,
                  java.lang.String catId)
                    throws VersionException,
                           LockException,
                           PathNotFoundException,
                           AccessDeniedException,
                           RepositoryException,
                           DatabaseException
        Remove a category from a node.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        catId - Category id (the UUID of the category node).
        抛出:
        VersionException - A document checked in can't be modified.
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no node in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the node because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • addKeyword

        java.lang.String addKeyword(java.lang.String token,
                          java.lang.String nodePath,
                          java.lang.String keyword)
                            throws VersionException,
                                   LockException,
                                   PathNotFoundException,
                                   AccessDeniedException,
                                   RepositoryException,
                                   DatabaseException
        Add a keyword to a node.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        keyword - The keyword to be added.
        抛出:
        VersionException - A document checked in can't be modified.
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no node in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the node because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

      • removeKeyword

        void removeKeyword(java.lang.String token,
                 java.lang.String nodePath,
                 java.lang.String keyword)
                   throws VersionException,
                          LockException,
                          PathNotFoundException,
                          AccessDeniedException,
                          RepositoryException,
                          DatabaseException
        Remove a keyword from a node.
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        keyword - The keyword to be removed.
        抛出:
        VersionException - A document checked in can't be modified.
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no node in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the node because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException
